items.sentence: I\'ll help you after I\'ve finished doing this.
It looks like Tom only wears expensive clothes.
It might be too late to do anything about that.
I sent my mother some flowers on Mother\'s Day.
I should\'ve studied harder for my French test.
I should\'ve told Tom that I felt the same way.
Tom was wearing a mask to conceal his identity.
Tom went to school to learn how to tune pianos.
Tom will be able to solve the problem, I think.
Tom wondered who Mary was planning to vote for.
